submission:
class Solution:
    def minChanges(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        mallu = defaultdict(list)
        valo = []

        nanu = len(nums)
        thullu = nanu // 2
        
        for i in range(thullu):
            a = nums[i]
            b = nums[nanu - i - 1]
            diff = abs(a - b)

            X = max(a, b, k - a, k - b)

            mallu[diff].append(X)
            valo.append(X)

        ans = nanu
        valo.sort()

        for diff, values in mallu.items():
            index = bisect_left(valo, diff)
            T = index * 2 + (thullu - index)

            for X in values:
                if X < diff:
                    T -= 2
                else:
                    T -= 1

            ans = min(ans, T)

        return ans
